summary: Provides the core abstractions and utilities for sending, receiving, and responding to typed input data between Prefect flow runs at runtime. It defines a base input model, automatic handling for generated inputs, and iterator helpers that support both synchronous and asynchronous consumption, enabling two-way communication and real-time data exchange across distributed workflow executions.
business_intent: Enable dynamic, type‑safe communication between separate workflow instances, allowing flows to exchange data on‑the‑fly, react to incoming information, and maintain continuous synchronization in microservice‑oriented or distributed systems.
